intro: Psychotria kumbangii, commonly known as the Kumbangii Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias, and is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its leaves are usually elliptical, glossy, and have a dark green color. Psychotria kumbangii is often found in shaded, humid environments and plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its native habitat.
